practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Wrongful Death|Trucking Accidents|Brain Injury|Birth Injury
description:
Our law firm, Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys, is there to guide people through the complex and emotional process of bankruptcy in Salem, Oregon. Starting over financially can be overwhelming. Clients turn to us for advice because of our many decades of combined legal knowledge and experience handling common and niche debt elimination. We not only want to help people achieve solvency but also educate them on their options.

We offer assistance handling Chapter 7, Chapter 11 and Chapter 13 bankruptcies for individuals and businesses. Beyond these routine routes to liquidation or repayment, our law firm provides focused support for families in the farming or fishing industries via Chapter 12. Regardless of which solution is best in any case, we are also dedicated to helping clients avoid harassment from creditors during and after filing for bankruptcy. In addition to overcoming debt, we represent people who are recovering from serious accidents involving cars, trucks, motorcycles and pedestrians. We also advocate for victims of brain and birth injuries as well as families who experienced the wrongful death of a loved one. Our attorneys are skilled in negotiating with insurance companies and obtaining comprehensive settlements.

Nearly 30 years ago, Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys became one of the first practices to provide free initial consultations to prospective clients. Today, we remain as committed as ever to delivering outstanding service. Our law firm continues to offer a free preliminary consultation and case evaluation to people across the state of Oregon and Tri-County area of Washington at our office. To promote efficiency, we accept credit cards as payment.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
